Class Board

java.lang.Object
Models.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board, including tiles, objectives, and observers.

      Adds observers to the board.
      Parameters:
      observers - The array of observers to add.

      Returns:

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int x, int y)
      Returns the tile at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate.
      y - The Y coordinate.
      Returns:
      The tile at the specified coordinates.

    • getTiles

      public Tile[][] getTiles()
      Returns the 2D array of tiles.
      Returns:
      The 2D array of tiles.

    • moveTile

      public void moveTile(int x, int y, Side direction)
      Moves a tile in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the tile to move.
      y - The Y coordinate of the tile to move.
      direction - The direction to move the tile.

    • moveRange

      public void moveRange(int index, Side direction, Player[] players)
      Moves a range of tiles in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the range to move.
      direction - The direction to move the range.
      players - The array of players.
